reviewText: My granddaughter has been watching this show since we stumbled across it one random Sunday . She will be 2 in February and she really enjoys watching it. Its very entertaining. Unfortunately, there are only 3 or 4 shows.

Feels somewhat cheesy but my 3 year old loves it!  He answer Ruby's questions out loud and seems to get excited about ways to play & communicate w/his baby sister. He especially likes the songs and dances!
Wonderful content! A show parents can feel good about their kids watching!
My daughter loves the songs. Great show teaching siblings how to get along.
Quality thoughtful programming perfect for young children. Cute animations and overall aesthetic. My kids love it and I feel no screen time guilt with this one.
Our family loves the DVD series from Ruby's Studio.
Great show for kids. Hope they put out more

The Siblings Show couldn't have come at a better time for me and my family.  I have three kids who constantly fight and it drives me nuts.  My children watched the show and were totally engaged the whole time.  I wasn't sure what would happen after they watched it but they have asked me to watch it repeatedly and it has opened up a new dialog in the house on how we can all get along.  I highly recommend this DVD to any family that is suffering from sibling rivalry.

The Siblings Show is fun and engaging and had the kids asking to watch it again and again. They especially enjoyed dancing around to The Siblings Shake! Can't wait to get more DVDs from Ruby's Studio!
